Class.Name: Batch Upload
Class.Caption: Batch Upload
Class.Documentation: This is an incoming file that is about to be or has been processed.

Attribute.Name: Filename
Attribute.Caption: Filename
Attribute.Documentation: This is the name of the file that was imported

Attribute.Name: ErrorEmail
Attribute.Caption: Error Email
Attribute.Documentation: This is the email that the errors where sent to. It is a copy of the employer uploademail at the time of the processing.

Attribute.Name: ErrorMessage
Attribute.Caption: Error Message
Attribute.Documentation: This is the error message sent to the upload contact.

Class.Name: ChargeSchedule
Class.Caption: ChargeSchedule
Class.Documentation: This is a batch header for a billing run

Class.Name: Contract
Class.Caption: Contract
Class.Documentation: A contract allows an employer or agency to place job advertisements on a website. For the jobs to be shown, the website, contract and job all need to be active and current. Contracts can be pre-paid or credit. For each active credit contract, a charge schedule can be produced at month-end.

Attribute.Name: StartDate
Attribute.Caption: Start Date
Attribute.Documentation: Start date of the contract

Attribute.Name: ExpiryDate
Attribute.Caption: Expiry Date
Attribute.Documentation: Expiry date of the contract. Jobs under this contract will no longer be displayed after this date.

Attribute.Name: OsJobCount
Attribute.Caption: Os Job Count
Attribute.Documentation: This is the outstanding jobs available for this contract.

Attribute.Name: MonthlyPrice
Attribute.Caption: Monthly Price
Attribute.Documentation: The monthly price is the base charge to the advertiser excluding any pricing options.

Attribute.Name: SinglePrice
Attribute.Caption: Single Price
Attribute.Documentation: The single price is the base charge to the advertiser excluding any pricing options that is charged at the start of the contract.

Attribute.Name: CancellationDate
Attribute.Caption: Cancellation Date
Attribute.Documentation: This when the contract was cancelled

Attribute.Name: IsCredit
Attribute.Caption: Is Credit
Attribute.Documentation: This indicates whether the recruiter is a pre-pay casual recruiter.

Attribute.Name: CancellationReason
Attribute.Caption: Cancellation Reason
Attribute.Documentation: This is the reason that the contract was cancelled

Attribute.Name: IsOnhold
Attribute.Caption: Is Onhold
Attribute.Documentation: This will allow the sales person or administrator to place a contract on hold

Operation.Name: makeInactive
Operation.Documentation: This will transfer any jobs to an active recruiter

Class.Name: Contract Option
Class.Caption: Contract Option
Class.Documentation: This indicates whether a specific contract contains a specific pricing option.

Attribute.Name: Price
Attribute.Caption: Price
Attribute.Documentation: This indicates how much show be charged on a job by job basis.

Class.Name: Contract Type
Class.Caption: Contract Type
Class.Documentation: This provides you with the ability to set up contract types that either be selected by recruiters or by the salesman.

Attribute.Name: Name
Attribute.Caption: Name
Attribute.Documentation: This is the name of the type of contract. e.g. Unlimited, 4-Pack or Single-Job say.

Attribute.Name: IsPublic
Attribute.Caption: Is Public
Attribute.Documentation: This indicates whether the contact type can be set up by a recruiter or whether it has to be set up by a sales person.

Attribute.Name: JobCount
Attribute.Caption: Job Count
Attribute.Documentation: This is the number of jobs that can be setup under this contract.

Attribute.Name: MonthCount
Attribute.Caption: Month Count
Attribute.Documentation: This is the number of months that this contract type is available.

Attribute.Name: MonthlyPrice
Attribute.Caption: Monthly Price
Attribute.Documentation: This is the monthly base charge for any contracts that are created with this contract type

Attribute.Name: SetupPrice
Attribute.Caption: Setup Price
Attribute.Documentation: This is the setup price for any contracts that are created with this contract type

Attribute.Name: AdvertLength
Attribute.Caption: Advert Length
Attribute.Documentation: No of days that a job is advertised.

Attribute.Name: SecurityLink
Attribute.Caption: Security Link
Attribute.Documentation: If this pricing option is to unlock a certain part of the website for certain advertisers then this field contains the relevant entry from the security rights table.

Class.Name: Country
Class.Caption: Country
Class.Documentation: The website contains a list of valid countries.

Class.Name: Email
Class.Caption: Email
Class.Documentation: This is a log of emails sent

Attribute.Name: Sender
Attribute.Caption: Sender
Attribute.Documentation: Names of the email sender

Attribute.Name: Receiver
Attribute.Caption: Receiver
Attribute.Documentation: Receiver of the email

Attribute.Name: Subject
Attribute.Caption: Subject
Attribute.Documentation: This is the email subject line

Attribute.Name: Body
Attribute.Caption: Body
Attribute.Documentation: This is the body of the email

Attribute.Name: SentDate
Attribute.Caption: Sent Date
Attribute.Documentation: This is the datetime that the email was sent. If it is null then it is due to be sent.

Attribute.Name: Headers
Attribute.Caption: Headers
Attribute.Documentation: This is used to hold mime types

Class.Name: Employer
Class.Caption: Employer
Class.Documentation: An employer may be a recruitment agency or a direct employer. The direct employers and the small recruitment agencies are likely to be pre-pay customers while the larger agencies are likely to be credit customers that need a charge schedule.

Attribute.Name: Name
Attribute.Caption: Name
Attribute.Documentation: This is the company or organizational name

Attribute.Name: Address
Attribute.Caption: Address
Attribute.Documentation: This is the company or organizational postal address. It can hold several lines separated by CR/LF.

Attribute.Name: CityorTown
Attribute.Caption: City Or Town
Attribute.Documentation: This is the name of the town or city where the organisation is located. If it in a city, the suburb is assumed to be the last line of the address field.

Attribute.Name: Postcode
Attribute.Caption: Postcode
Attribute.Documentation: This postcode field must obey the format held in the website formats field.

Attribute.Name: Fax
Attribute.Caption: Fax
Attribute.Documentation: This is the fax number for fax job applications for the company

Attribute.Name: URL
Attribute.Caption: URL
Attribute.Documentation: Website link

Attribute.Name: RedirectionURL
Attribute.Caption: Redirection URL
Attribute.Documentation: This indicates whether any applications will be redirected to the employers website..

Attribute.Name: Profile
Attribute.Caption: Profile
Attribute.Documentation: Webpage profile

Attribute.Name: IsAgency
Attribute.Caption: Is Agency
Attribute.Documentation: This indicates whether the current advertiser is a recruitment agency or a direct employer..

Attribute.Name: ApplicationEmail
Attribute.Caption: Application Email
Attribute.Documentation: If this exists then all job applications will be sent to this email address. You can enter multiple addresses separated by semi-colons..

Attribute.Name: EmailSubjectLine
Attribute.Caption: Email Subject Line
Attribute.Documentation: This controls the format of the subject line of any job application emails.

Attribute.Name: LogoLarge
Attribute.Caption: Logo Large
Attribute.Documentation: This allow you to set up a special image used by the template

Attribute.Name: LogoSmall
Attribute.Caption: Logo Small
Attribute.Documentation: This is a thumbnail of the larger logo

Attribute.Name: IsInactive
Attribute.Caption: Is Inactive
Attribute.Documentation: This enables the site administrator or saleperson to mark at an employer inactive. Possible scenarios are a web-scam or a credit control problem.

Attribute.Name: IsUploadActive
Attribute.Caption: Is Upload Active
Attribute.Documentation: This allows control of whether the system autouploads even if there is an active contract.

Attribute.Name: UploadWatchDirectory
Attribute.Caption: Upload Watch Directory
Attribute.Documentation: This can be in the form of a file directory or an FTP directory. If FTP, it can be in the form ftp://user:password@hostname/directory

Attribute.Name: UploadEmail
Attribute.Caption: Upload Email
Attribute.Documentation: JobUniverse supports automated uploads by FTP. If there are errors in the uploaded batch, who should receive an email warning. Multiple email addresses can be entered separated by semi-colons..

Attribute.Name: Introduction
Attribute.Caption: Introduction
Attribute.Documentation: This company introduction is used by JobUniverse to briefly describe the organisation to potential employees in the advertiser list..

Attribute.Name: PaymentEngineCode
Attribute.Caption: Payment Engine Code
Attribute.Documentation: This is used to indicate the returning customer to an external payment engine.

Attribute.Name: AllowCredit
Attribute.Caption: Allow Credit
Attribute.Documentation: This will allow this employer to have contract on account that will be billed at month-end.

Attribute.Name: AgencyDiscount
Attribute.Caption: Agency Discount
Attribute.Documentation: If this is an agency, then entering a discount here will allow this account to place jobs for other employers

Class.Name: Employer History
Class.Caption: Employer History
Class.Documentation: This records the traffic status of an employer on a given day.

Attribute.Name: JobCount
Attribute.Caption: Job Count
Attribute.Documentation: No of jobs active at the end of the day

Attribute.Name: ViewCount
Attribute.Caption: View Count
Attribute.Documentation: No of job views on this day for this employer

Attribute.Name: ApplicationCount
Attribute.Caption: Application Count
Attribute.Documentation: No of applications on that day

Attribute.Name: AlertCount
Attribute.Caption: Alert Count
Attribute.Documentation: No of email alerts sent out on behalf of this employer on this day

Class.Name: Error
Class.Caption: Error
Class.Documentation: This is a log of website errors

Class.Name: Filter Answer
Class.Caption: Filter Answer
Class.Documentation: This contains the total of a given filer category test

Attribute.Name: Grade
Attribute.Caption: Grade
Attribute.Documentation: This is a processed result based on the score and maxscore

Class.Name: Filter Category
Class.Caption: Filter Category
Class.Documentation: Filter questions are grouped into preset categories. For instance, Arithmetic, Language, Cultural, Technical.

Attribute.Name: Pattern
Attribute.Caption: Pattern
Attribute.Documentation: Question count for easy,medium, hard. e.g. 8,8,4

Attribute.Name: TimeLimit
Attribute.Caption: Time Limit
Attribute.Documentation: No of seconds allowed. default 60

Attribute.Name: Quartile1
Attribute.Caption: Quartile1
Attribute.Documentation: Percentage needed to avoid being in the bottom quartile.

Attribute.Name: Quartile2
Attribute.Caption: Quartile2
Attribute.Documentation: Percentage needed to get above average

Attribute.Name: Quartile3
Attribute.Caption: Quartile3
Attribute.Documentation: Percentage needed to be in the top quartile.

Class.Name: Filter Question
Class.Caption: Filter Question
Class.Documentation: Filter questions can be used by a website to grade job seekers according to certain filter categories (Arithmeitc, English...). The can also be used by an advertiser to ask specific questions fro certain jobs.

Attribute.Name: MultichoiceList
Attribute.Caption: Multichoice List
Attribute.Documentation: Answers separated by semicolons. Acceptable answers preceded by an asterisk..

Attribute.Name: SortCode
Attribute.Caption: Sort Code
Attribute.Documentation: Questions will be sorted into category, sortcode and then alphabetic.

Attribute.Name: RightCount
Attribute.Caption: Right Count
Attribute.Documentation: No of times this question was answered correctly

Attribute.Name: WrongCount
Attribute.Caption: Wrong Count
Attribute.Documentation: No of times this question was answered incorrectly

Attribute.Name: UnansweredCount
Attribute.Caption: Unanswered Count
Attribute.Documentation: No of times this question was displayed but was unanswered.

Class.Name: Help
Class.Caption: Help
Class.Documentation: This has the help text entries

Attribute.Name: Name
Attribute.Caption: Name
Attribute.Documentation: This is the key to lookup the help info

Attribute.Name: Text
Attribute.Caption: Text
Attribute.Documentation: This is the actual help text

Class.Name: Job
Class.Caption: Job
Class.Documentation: Each job has sufficient details so that a job seeker can determine whether it is a good match.

Attribute.Name: JobTitle
Attribute.Caption: Job Title
Attribute.Documentation: The name of the job. e.g. MSAccess Analysis/Programmer

Attribute.Name: JobReference
Attribute.Caption: Job Reference
Attribute.Documentation: This is the advertisers job reference number

Attribute.Name: Town
Attribute.Caption: Town
Attribute.Documentation: This is the town or city where the job is based

Attribute.Name: Suburb
Attribute.Caption: Suburb
Attribute.Documentation: This is the optional suburb where the job is based

Attribute.Name: IsPermanent
Attribute.Caption: Is Permanent
Attribute.Documentation: {C=Contract,P=Permanent,E=Either} Indicates whether the job is contract or permanent.

Attribute.Name: ContractTerm
Attribute.Caption: Contract Term
Attribute.Documentation: For contract jobs, this is normally the initial number of months of the contract.

Attribute.Name: IsFullTime
Attribute.Caption: Is Full Time
Attribute.Documentation: {Y=Yes,N=No,E=Either} Indicates whether the job is part-time or full-time

Attribute.Name: ShortDescription
Attribute.Caption: Short Description
Attribute.Documentation: Optional brief description of the job. If there is no short description, the first 100 characters of the full-description will be used.

Attribute.Name: FullDescription
Attribute.Caption: Full Description
Attribute.Documentation: Full Description of the job with limited HTML markup capabilities.

Attribute.Name: MinimumSalary
Attribute.Caption: Minimum Salary
Attribute.Documentation: Optional start of the salary range.

Attribute.Name: MaximumSalary
Attribute.Caption: Maximum Salary
Attribute.Documentation: Optional top of the salary range.

Attribute.Name: Bullet1
Attribute.Caption: Bullet1
Attribute.Documentation: Optional first Job highlight for emphasis.

Attribute.Name: Bullet2
Attribute.Caption: Bullet2
Attribute.Documentation: Second Job highlight.

Attribute.Name: Bullet3
Attribute.Caption: Bullet3
Attribute.Documentation: Third Job highlight.

Attribute.Name: ExcludeOverseas
Attribute.Caption: Exclude Overseas
Attribute.Documentation: This indicates whether the person needs to be an NZ Resident

Attribute.Name: ExcludeNonCitizens
Attribute.Caption: Exclude Non Citizens
Attribute.Documentation: This excludes people who are not citizens or who have no permenant residency.

Attribute.Name: IncludeDefaultText
Attribute.Caption: Include Default Text
Attribute.Documentation: If this is ticked then the default fault text from the bottom of the job template will be shown.

Attribute.Name: ApplicationEmail
Attribute.Caption: Application Email
Attribute.Documentation: One or more emails can be separated by semi-colons. Each will receive application notifications for thei job.

Attribute.Name: IsLibrary
Attribute.Caption: Is Library
Attribute.Documentation: Indicates whether a draft job is a library job or not.

Attribute.Name: TodayCount
Attribute.Caption: Today Count
Attribute.Documentation: Count of todays views

Attribute.Name: ViewCount
Attribute.Caption: View Count
Attribute.Documentation: Total number of views for this job

Attribute.Name: hash
Attribute.Caption: Hash
Attribute.Documentation: used for checking out duplicate job descriptions

Attribute.Name: ViewRandom
Attribute.Caption: View Random
Attribute.Documentation: used to nightly randomise the viewing of jobs

Attribute.Name: LocationList
Attribute.Caption: Location List
Attribute.Documentation: This is a list of location ids

Attribute.Name: AgencyID
Attribute.Caption: Agency ID
Attribute.Documentation: Maybe it should be an association, we'll see.

Class.Name: Job History
Class.Caption: Job History
Class.Documentation: This is a summary of the activity of a given job on a particular day

Attribute.Name: SummaryDate
Attribute.Caption: Summary Date
Attribute.Documentation: This is the date of the summary

Attribute.Name: JobTitle
Attribute.Caption: Job Title
Attribute.Documentation: Held for historical purposes so that the history lasts after the job has gone.

Attribute.Name: JobReference
Attribute.Caption: Job Reference
Attribute.Documentation: Held for historical purposes so that the history lasts after the job has gone.

Attribute.Name: SearchCount
Attribute.Caption: Search Count
Attribute.Documentation: No of times this has been shown on a search screen

Attribute.Name: ViewCount
Attribute.Caption: View Count
Attribute.Documentation: No of time this job's details have been viewed

Attribute.Name: ApplicationCount
Attribute.Caption: Application Count
Attribute.Documentation: No of applications for this job on this date

Attribute.Name: AlertCount
Attribute.Caption: Alert Count
Attribute.Documentation: No of emails sent out today with this job on it

Class.Name: JobAlert
Class.Caption: JobAlert
Class.Documentation: This is an email sent to a job-seeker for a given search profile.

Attribute.Name: wasBounced
Attribute.Caption: Was Bounced
Attribute.Documentation: Inidicates whether the email was bounced

Class.Name: JobApplication
Class.Caption: JobApplication
Class.Documentation: This indicates that a jobseeker applied for a specific job.

Attribute.Name: CVFilename
Attribute.Caption: CVFilename
Attribute.Documentation: This is the filename used by the jobseeker when the files was uploaded

Attribute.Name: CVLength
Attribute.Caption: CVLength
Attribute.Documentation: This is the byte length of the attachment

Attribute.Name: CVType
Attribute.Caption: CVType
Attribute.Documentation: This is the mime-type of the attachment

Attribute.Name: CVAttached
Attribute.Caption: CVAttached
Attribute.Documentation: This is the blob that is the attached CV.

Attribute.Name: Response
Attribute.Caption: Response
Attribute.Documentation: {U=Unknown,R=Reject,A=Accept,M=More Info,K=Auto kill,N=None yet} Indicates how the recruiter responded to the application.

Attribute.Name: Redirected
Attribute.Caption: Redirected
Attribute.Documentation: This indicates whether the application was redirected to the employers website.

Class.Name: JobCategory
Class.Caption: JobCategory
Class.Documentation: This itemises the broad skillsets that the job may be found in.

Attribute.Name: Name
Attribute.Caption: Name
Attribute.Documentation: This is the name of the job position e.g. Business Analyst

Attribute.Name: Keywords
Attribute.Caption: Keywords
Attribute.Documentation: This is a list of keywords separated by semi-colons to indicate that a job may be of this category type.

Attribute.Name: MinimumKeywordCount
Attribute.Caption: Minimum Keyword Count
Attribute.Documentation: This is the number of keywords that must found to trigger a positive categorisation

Attribute.Name: IsReportable
Attribute.Caption: Is Reportable
Attribute.Documentation: Used to control the roll up of reporting totals. So you can break the job categories down into small items but report at a higher level.

Class.Name: JobOption
Class.Caption: JobOption
Class.Documentation: This determines whether a job is favoured or hot.

Attribute.Name: FromDate
Attribute.Caption: From Date
Attribute.Documentation: Start date for the jobs special status.

Attribute.Name: ToDate
Attribute.Caption: To Date
Attribute.Documentation: Last date for the jobs special status.

Class.Name: JobSeeker
Class.Caption: JobSeeker
Class.Documentation: This is a person looking for a job.

Attribute.Name: Name
Attribute.Caption: Name
Attribute.Documentation: This is the full name of the job seeker.

Attribute.Name: Email
Attribute.Caption: Email
Attribute.Documentation: This is the email address of the job seeker.

Attribute.Name: Password
Attribute.Caption: Password
Attribute.Documentation: This is the password of the job seeker.

Attribute.Name: HasHTMLEmail
Attribute.Caption: Has HTMLEmail
Attribute.Documentation: Inicates whether to send text or HTML email.

Attribute.Name: DoNotSolicit
Attribute.Caption: Do Not Solicit
Attribute.Documentation: Allow occasional unsolicited emails.

Attribute.Name: LastSearch
Attribute.Caption: Last Search
Attribute.Documentation: This indicates the last time you searched so that it can flag any changes.

Attribute.Name: LastLogin
Attribute.Caption: Last Login
Attribute.Documentation: This is the last time the user logged in.

Attribute.Name: IsNational
Attribute.Caption: Is National
Attribute.Documentation: Are you a national or permanent resident of {$thiscountry}?

Attribute.Name: CanInterview
Attribute.Caption: Can Interview
Attribute.Documentation: Are you available for face-to-face interview?

Attribute.Name: ReactivationDate
Attribute.Caption: Reactivation Date
Attribute.Documentation: This allows the job seeker to suspend job hunting, while they are on holiday, say.

Attribute.Name: CancelReason
Attribute.Caption: Cancel Reason
Attribute.Documentation: The reason this job seekers profile was cancel.

Attribute.Name: CancelDate
Attribute.Caption: Cancel Date
Attribute.Documentation: When this job seeker's profile was cancel.

Attribute.Name: BounceCount
Attribute.Caption: Bounce Count
Attribute.Documentation: Number of email bounces so far.

Attribute.Name: AlertFrequency
Attribute.Caption: Alert Frequency
Attribute.Documentation: A=Asap,D=daily,W=Weekly

Attribute.Name: grade1
Attribute.Caption: Grade1
Attribute.Documentation: This is the test grading 1

Attribute.Name: grade2
Attribute.Caption: Grade2
Attribute.Documentation: This is the test grading 2

Attribute.Name: grade3
Attribute.Caption: Grade3
Attribute.Documentation: This is the test grading 3

Attribute.Name: Phone
Attribute.Caption: Phone
Attribute.Documentation: This is your mobile or home phone number.

Attribute.Name: ResponseCodes
Attribute.Caption: Response Codes
Attribute.Documentation: This is to allow the administrator to setup response codes for email broadcasts

Class.Name: JobSeekerExtra
Class.Caption: JobSeekerExtra
Class.Documentation: This holds the blobs for the jobseeker

Attribute.Name: Headshot
Attribute.Caption: Headshot
Attribute.Documentation: Photo of person

Attribute.Name: Video
Attribute.Caption: Video
Attribute.Documentation: This allows a 30second clip

Class.Name: JobSkillProfile
Class.Caption: JobSkillProfile
Class.Documentation: A job can require many skills

Attribute.Name: Importance
Attribute.Caption: Importance
Attribute.Documentation: {High,Medium,Low}

Class.Name: JobViewRequest
Class.Caption: JobViewRequest
Class.Documentation: Indicates that there was a request to see a specific job.

Attribute.Name: Source
Attribute.Caption: Source
Attribute.Documentation: This may be the website which made the request for the details

Class.Name: Location
Class.Caption: Location
Class.Documentation: Suburb in City or Town

Attribute.Name: Name
Attribute.Caption: Name
Attribute.Documentation: This is the name of the suburb or town.

Attribute.Name: IsReportable
Attribute.Caption: Is Reportable
Attribute.Documentation: Allows you to have non-reportable locations such as North-Shore that will be rolled up into Auckland for reporting purposes.

Attribute.Name: Keywords
Attribute.Caption: Keywords
Attribute.Documentation: Comma seperated list of suburbs or aliases

Class.Name: PastEmployment
Class.Caption: PastEmployment
Class.Documentation: This is a record of employment in a jobseekers CV

Attribute.Name: PositionHeld
Attribute.Caption: Position Held
Attribute.Documentation: This is the job title of your position

Class.Name: Picture
Class.Caption: Picture
Class.Documentation: This holds webdesign images, template images, jobseeker headshots and personal videos

Attribute.Name: OwnerType
Attribute.Caption: Owner Type
Attribute.Documentation: e.g. template,headshot,personalvideo

Attribute.Name: Image
Attribute.Caption: Image
Attribute.Documentation: May be an image or a picture

Attribute.Name: Format
Attribute.Caption: Format
Attribute.Documentation: jpg, gif, flv,

Class.Name: Placement
Class.Caption: Placement
Class.Documentation: This is the placement of a given job on a given website covered by a given contract.

Attribute.Name: WithdrawnDate
Attribute.Caption: Withdrawn Date
Attribute.Documentation: If the job is withdrawn then this is the date of the withdrawl.

Class.Name: Pricing Option
Class.Caption: Pricing Option
Class.Documentation: Pricing Optionals are used for allowing us a fine degree of control of who can use what facilities within job universe. They are effectively extentions of base contract types.

Attribute.Name: Name
Attribute.Caption: Name
Attribute.Documentation: This the name of the pricing option

Attribute.Name: Price
Attribute.Caption: Price
Attribute.Documentation: This is the pricing of using the option

Attribute.Name: Description
Attribute.Caption: Description
Attribute.Documentation: This describes the benefits of using this option

Attribute.Name: Letter
Attribute.Caption: Letter
Attribute.Documentation: This is a unique code placed in the placement options for the fast recognition of jobs that have this advertising option.

Class.Name: Qualification
Class.Caption: Qualification
Class.Documentation: This has the qualification details as part of a job seekers CV

Attribute.Name: Qualification
Attribute.Caption: Qualification
Attribute.Documentation: B.Com., M.Sc, MCP or whatever

Attribute.Name: Subject
Attribute.Caption: Subject
Attribute.Documentation: English, Maths, Project Management or whatever

Attribute.Name: ReceivedOn
Attribute.Caption: Received On
Attribute.Documentation: This is the month when you received the qualification.

Attribute.Name: Institution
Attribute.Caption: Institution
Attribute.Documentation: This is the institution or qualification authority if from an examination board.

Class.Name: Recruiter
Class.Caption: Recruiter
Class.Documentation: This is the a person who works at an employer or agency.

Attribute.Name: Name
Attribute.Caption: Name
Attribute.Documentation: This is the name of a person who works at an advertiser.

Attribute.Name: Password
Attribute.Caption: Password
Attribute.Documentation: This is the password of a recruiter who works at an advertiser.

Attribute.Name: Email
Attribute.Caption: Email
Attribute.Documentation: This is the email address of a recruiter who works at an advertiser.

Attribute.Name: IsInactive
Attribute.Caption: Is Inactive
Attribute.Documentation: Indicates if a recruiter who works at an advertiser is stll active.

Attribute.Name: Phone
Attribute.Caption: Phone
Attribute.Documentation: This is the contact phone of a recruiter who works at an advertiser.

Attribute.Name: IsSupervisor
Attribute.Caption: Is Supervisor
Attribute.Documentation: This indicates whether this contact should have a supervisory role within thei advertiser records. Only system admin or a supervisor can make another person a supervisor.

Class.Name: Saved Job
Class.Caption: Saved Job
Class.Documentation: This indicates which jobs have been saved by which job seeker.

Class.Name: Search Profile
Class.Caption: Search Profile
Class.Documentation: This is a search profile for a job seeker

Attribute.Name: Keywords
Attribute.Caption: Keywords
Attribute.Documentation: Search keywords used for creating job alerts.

Attribute.Name: AndKeywords
Attribute.Caption: And Keywords
Attribute.Documentation: Used to indicate whether to use "any" or "all" of the keywords to match a job.

Attribute.Name: Town
Attribute.Caption: Town
Attribute.Documentation: This is the name of town or the city

Attribute.Name: IsPermanent
Attribute.Caption: Is Permanent
Attribute.Documentation: {C=Contract,P=Permanent,E=Either} Indicates whether the job seeker is looking for a temporary or permanent position.

Attribute.Name: IsFullTime
Attribute.Caption: Is Full Time
Attribute.Documentation: {Y=Yes,N=No,E=Either} Indicates whether the job seeker is looking for a part-time or full-time position.

Attribute.Name: IsEmailAlert
Attribute.Caption: Is Email Alert
Attribute.Documentation: This search profile may be saved to run at a future time or set up to run every night and find out if there any new jobs matching it.

Attribute.Name: WithSkillProfile
Attribute.Caption: With Skill Profile
Attribute.Documentation: Indicates whether the search should also use the skill profile

Attribute.Name: MinimumSalary
Attribute.Caption: Minimum Salary
Attribute.Documentation: Putting a low minimum salary will increase the chances of finding out about a job and then negotiating higher.

Class.Name: SeekerSkillProfile
Class.Caption: SeekerSkillProfile
Class.Documentation: A jobseeker can claim many skills

Attribute.Name: Level
Attribute.Caption: Level
Attribute.Documentation: {High,Medium,Low}

Attribute.Name: IsDesired
Attribute.Caption: Is Desired
Attribute.Documentation: This indicates whether wish a position that uses this skill.

Class.Name: SiteParameter
Class.Caption: SiteParameter
Class.Documentation: This holds a list of parameters for each website. Such as date format, currency format

Attribute.Name: Block
Attribute.Caption: Block
Attribute.Documentation: This is used to seperate the parameters onto seperate pages.

Attribute.Name: Name
Attribute.Caption: Name
Attribute.Documentation: This is the name of the parameter

Attribute.Name: Value
Attribute.Caption: Value
Attribute.Documentation: This is the value of the parameter

Attribute.Name: Note
Attribute.Caption: Note
Attribute.Documentation: This is used to provide the administrator with some help

Class.Name: Skill
Class.Caption: Skill
Class.Documentation: Each job and job seeker can profile their skills which are grouped in categories. e.g. UML mighted be categorized under "Business Analysis"

Attribute.Name: Name
Attribute.Caption: Name
Attribute.Documentation: This is the name of a skill such as "SAP Integration"

Attribute.Name: Keywords
Attribute.Caption: Keywords
Attribute.Documentation: This may be used for identifying key skills from a job description.

Class.Name: Skill Category
Class.Caption: Skill Category
Class.Documentation: Each job and job seeker can profile their skills which are grouped in categories. e.g. UML mighted be categorized under 'Business Analysis'

Class.Name: Template
Class.Caption: Template
Class.Documentation: This is a set of HTML and positioning instructions in the form of a smarty template that you can use for controlling a job display.

Attribute.Name: Name
Attribute.Caption: Name
Attribute.Documentation: This is a descriptive name for the template

Attribute.Name: FileName
Attribute.Caption: File Name
Attribute.Documentation: This is the location of the include file

Attribute.Name: Thumbnail
Attribute.Caption: Thumbnail
Attribute.Documentation: This is the location of the thumbnail

Attribute.Name: StyleSheet
Attribute.Caption: Style Sheet
Attribute.Documentation: This allows a template to have a special stylesheet

Attribute.Name: Contents
Attribute.Caption: Contents
Attribute.Documentation: Default text that should be displayed on the bottom of all jobs using this template.

Class.Name: Template Image
Class.Caption: Template Image
Class.Documentation: These are the images that are used in a template.

Attribute.Name: Name
Attribute.Caption: Name
Attribute.Documentation: This is the name of image within the dataset

Attribute.Name: Image
Attribute.Caption: Image
Attribute.Documentation: This is the binary image

Class.Name: Transaction
Class.Caption: Transaction
Class.Documentation: This is the information of a credit-card payment entered into a web-page and passed to a payment engine.

Attribute.Name: Amount
Attribute.Caption: Amount
Attribute.Documentation: This is the total amount of the payment including any sales tax.

Attribute.Name: NetAmount
Attribute.Caption: Net Amount
Attribute.Documentation: This is the amount less any sales tax.

Attribute.Name: SalesTax
Attribute.Caption: Sales Tax
Attribute.Documentation: This is the amount of sales tax in the transaction

Attribute.Name: TransactionType
Attribute.Caption: Transaction Type
Attribute.Documentation: {C=Credit Card,A=On Account,J=Journal}

Attribute.Name: Description
Attribute.Caption: Description
Attribute.Documentation: This is a text description of the transaction

Attribute.Name: IsCredit
Attribute.Caption: Is Credit
Attribute.Documentation: This is a copy of the IsCredit field at the time of the transaction. It is used to identify which transactions should be printed.

Attribute.Name: PaymentEngineCode
Attribute.Caption: Payment Engine Code
Attribute.Documentation: This is the code given by the payment engine

Attribute.Name: Status
Attribute.Caption: Status
Attribute.Documentation: {O=Sent to DPS,A=Accepted,R=Rejected,X=Timed-out,I=Invoiced,C=Chargeable}

Attribute.Name: Details
Attribute.Caption: Details
Attribute.Documentation: This is a PHP array that holds the details for posting once the payment ic cleared

Class.Name: Upload Profile
Class.Caption: Upload Profile
Class.Documentation: This holds any details required for uploading batches of jobs.

Attribute.Name: IsActive
Attribute.Caption: Is Active
Attribute.Documentation: This will allow us to deactivate an upload account regardless of the status of the contract.

Attribute.Name: WatchDirectory
Attribute.Caption: Watch Directory
Attribute.Documentation: This may be a file directory or an FTP directory. It may be in the form ftp://user:password@hostname/directory

Class.Name: Website
Class.Caption: Website
Class.Documentation: This is the target website. At the time of writing, there is only one. JobUniverse.co.nz

Attribute.Name: Name
Attribute.Caption: Name
Attribute.Documentation: This is the name of the website

Attribute.Name: isActive
Attribute.Caption: Is Active
Attribute.Documentation: This indicates whether the site is currently active. If not, it will not accept job adverts.

Class.Name: Enhancement
Class.Caption: Enhancement
Class.Documentation: These are bug enhancements

Attribute.Name: Priority
Attribute.Caption: Priority
Attribute.Documentation: A,B or C

Attribute.Name: Context
Attribute.Caption: Context
Attribute.Documentation: Used to constrain the action to only be available in certain contexts.

Attribute.Name: SecurityLevel
Attribute.Caption: Security Level
Attribute.Documentation: Used for linking to cascading menu security

Attribute.Name: Name
Attribute.Caption: Name
Attribute.Documentation: This is the first name and surname of the user.

Attribute.Name: NetworkId
Attribute.Caption: Network Id
Attribute.Documentation: This is used for autologin across a LAN

Attribute.Name: EmailAddress
Attribute.Caption: Email Address
Attribute.Documentation: The email address of the user so that we can send emails to them if required.

Attribute.Name: PhoneNumber
Attribute.Caption: Phone Number
Attribute.Documentation: The phone number of the user.

Attribute.Name: Level
Attribute.Caption: Level
Attribute.Documentation: Only used for simple version of security roles

Attribute.Name: Preferences
Attribute.Caption: Preferences
Attribute.Documentation: e.g. lasttemplate=45;lastdate=2007-09-01;blah1=2;blah2=3

Class.Name: WebAction
Class.Caption: WebAction
Class.Documentation: This holds the information about each web action

Attribute.Name: Name
Attribute.Caption: Name
Attribute.Documentation: e.g. employer_applicationlist

Attribute.Name: Title
Attribute.Caption: Title
Attribute.Documentation: User displayable action name. e.g. "List of Employer's applications"

Attribute.Name: Introduction
Attribute.Caption: Introduction
Attribute.Documentation: This can be used to place a small piece of content at the top of the page.

Attribute.Name: Footer
Attribute.Caption: Footer
Attribute.Documentation: This can be used to place a small piece of content at the bottom of the page.

Attribute.Name: SecurityLevel
Attribute.Caption: Security Level
Attribute.Documentation: Min security level required to execute this action

Attribute.Name: Size
Attribute.Caption: Size
Attribute.Documentation: This is the estimated size /earned value

Attribute.Name: ActionGroup
Attribute.Caption: Action Group
Attribute.Documentation: Allows us to group actions for planning and reporting

Attribute.Name: ProgrammedDate
Attribute.Caption: Programmed Date
Attribute.Documentation: This is the date the taks was handed to QA.

Attribute.Name: SignoffDate
Attribute.Caption: Signoff Date
Attribute.Documentation: This is the date that QA signed off the webaction

Attribute.Name: SignoffContentDate
Attribute.Caption: Signoff Content Date
Attribute.Documentation: This is when the content has been signed off.

Attribute.Name: Description
Attribute.Caption: Description
Attribute.Documentation: This is the hoverhint for any menu items for this action.

Attribute.Name: Style
Attribute.Caption: Style
Attribute.Documentation: Used for indicating what format is used

Attribute.Name: Parameters
Attribute.Caption: Parameters
Attribute.Documentation: This allows us some default processing

Attribute.Name: WeekNo
Attribute.Caption: Week No
Attribute.Documentation: This is the planned weekno to complete this task

Class.Name: Arc
Class.Caption: Arc
Class.Documentation: An arc links a place to a transition.

Attribute.Name: ArcType
Attribute.Caption: Arc Type
Attribute.Documentation: {sequential,and-split,and-join,or-split,or-join,xor-split}

Class.Name: Case
Class.Caption: Case
Class.Documentation: This holds the context and current status of a particular piece of work going through a workflow.

Attribute.Name: CaseStatus
Attribute.Caption: Case Status
Attribute.Documentation: {Open,Closed,Held,Cancelled}

Class.Name: Place
Class.Caption: Place
Class.Documentation: This holds the details of each place within a workflow. i.e. State within a state engine.

Class.Name: Token
Class.Caption: Token
Class.Documentation: This indicates that a piece of work is in a particular place.

Attribute.Name: token_status
Attribute.Caption: Token Status
Attribute.Documentation: {Enabled,Locked,Cancelled,Consumed}

Class.Name: Transition
Class.Caption: Transition
Class.Documentation: This holds the details for each transition within a workflow process. It points to the application task witin the menu database.

Attribute.Name: Triggertype
Attribute.Caption: Trigger Type
Attribute.Documentation: {user,auto,message,time}

Attribute.Name: Triggertype
Attribute.Caption: Trigger Type
Attribute.Documentation: {Automatic,User,Time,Message}

Class.Name: Workflow
Class.Caption: Workflow
Class.Documentation: This holds the definition for each workflow process. e.g. Fulfill order.

Class.Name: WorkItem
Class.Caption: WorkItem
Class.Documentation: This indicates when a transition is enabled and ready to fire.

Attribute.Name: Triggertype
Attribute.Caption: Trigger Type
Attribute.Documentation: {user,auto,message,time}

Attribute.Name: WorkItemStatus
Attribute.Caption: Work Item Status
Attribute.Documentation: {Enabled,Inprogress,Cancelled,Finished}
